title: The Case Of The Bogus Hydroxycholoroquine Study
description: A major medical journal reported that hydroxychloroquine harmed COVID patients, but a group of Twitter sleuths uncovered evidence that the paper wasn't what it seemed.
itunes:title: The Case Of The Bogus Hydroxycholoroquine Study
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, Anna Rothschild
itunes:subtitle: A major medical journal reported that hydroxychloroquine harmed COVID patients, but a group of Twitter sleuths uncovered evidence that the paper wasn't what it seemed.
itunes:summary: A major medical journal reported that hydroxychloroquine harmed COVID patients, but a group of Twitter sleuths uncovered evidence that the paper wasn't what it seemed.
